metadata.description: Build knowledge graphs from plain text or Markdown documents. Extracts entities and relationships, designs a graph schema, resolves entities to canonical forms, and emits nodes.csv + edges.csv in Neo4j bulk-import format.

plugins.name: kg-builder
plugins.description: Build knowledge graphs from plain text or Markdown documents. Extracts entities and relationships, designs a graph schema, resolves entities to canonical forms, and emits nodes.csv + edges.csv in Neo4j bulk-import format.
